name: Breakfast at Cemetery
description:
Breakfast at Cemetery is a QWOP styled game, where your task, as a skeleton, is to eat a nutritious breakfast against the clock!

Features:

  • 20 Breakfasts to eat!
  • Realistic* Physics
  • Unique skeleton arm interface
  • 2D graphics
  • Frantic gameplay

Have you got what it takes to eat ALL the breakfasts?

* Note: Not realistic at all
